issues.title: Manufacturing and Jobs
issues.description: Strong advocate for protecting American manufacturing jobs, supporting trade policies that protect domestic workers

issues.title: Great Lakes Environmental Protection
issues.description: Championed legislation to protect Great Lakes ecosystem and prevent environmental degradation
